snippet: Susan A. Barnett photographs T-shirt wearers, always from behind, and says the shirts are like “time capsules.”
abstract: Photographer Susan A Barnett has been documenting backs of people wearing interesting T-shirts since 2008; Barnett says shirts comment on identity and message wearer wishes to express; photos will be published in book T: A Typology of T-shirts.
lead_paragraph: Susan A. Barnett photographs T-shirt wearers, always from behind, and says the shirts are like “time capsules.”

headline.main: Watching Your Back, and What’s on It
headline.print_headline: Watching Your Back, and What’s on It
